name: Picturestack
description:
A short puzzle game where in each level you need to place the images in the right order  to complete the photo.

There is a total of 19 levels, but I might be adding more in the future.

You can use the album to visit completed levels or reset all your progress.

Controls

Use the left mouse click or touch to select/unselect images.

Source code

The project is also open source, you can check out the code in Github and use however you like!

Support

If you enjoyed this game (or hated it but want to support my continuous learning to come up with better ideas), you can buy me a coffee here 

Credits

  • Assets are taken from  Freepik - Flaticon.  They have been edited depending on the puzzle.
  • Developed using the Godot engine.

Walkthrough

You can find a  walkthrough of all the levels here.
